title: back to back 4v5 ranked games where mid DCs at the beginning of the game
body:
life is good. we even managed to win the first because mid came back when everyone was lvl 14... and garen/voli are mega tanks late game :) 2nd game ahri gave free roam to morde so they could just 3 man gank where ever they wanted with jungle and mid roaming. back to where i started... :/ 0 lp... again...

why do people bother trying to play ranked when they clearly have connection issues? they even said "i've been having connection issues" in pregame....
